_header: The arms of crist both god and man
_description: Indulgence for the Arma Christi devotions (2291, 4083, and 6744); seventeen irregular couplets.

BlairsColl13.First Lines:
These armis of crist boþe god & manSeint petir þe
                    pope descriuid bein…
BlairsColl13.Last Lines:
…And half ȝer and daies þreOf paradon þese
                    popes ȝeue þe

Longleat30.First Lines:
The armes of [crist?] both god and manSeynt pieter þe pope
                    discryued hem…
Longleat30.Last Lines:
…And half a yere and dayes threOf pardon these popes hath
                    graunted the
Longleat30.Attributed Title: This is the pardon of the prayers before (f. 11v)

HarTYP193.First Lines:
Theis armis of crist bothe gode an manSynt petir þe pope
                    discreuit hem…
HarTYP193.Last Lines:
…Ande a halfe ȝere ande days threof pardonne þes
                    popis haþ graunt it þe
HarTYP193.Note:
Fifteen couplets only, written as prose, later crossed out and word
                    ‘pope’ partly erased throughout.

HunHM142.First Lines:
The armes of criste both god and manSeynt peter þe pope
                    discryued hem…
HunHM142.Last Lines:
…And eche pope seyde to fore handeffor sycht of the uernacle
                    graunted xl dayes to pardon
HunHM142.Note: Lines 1-17 only, written all in rubric.
HunHM142.Attributed Title:
This is the pardon of the prayers before (f.
                    10v).
